description:
Music video produced by Cover Corp for the first official song of the hololive IDOL PROJECT, Shiny Smily Story, perfomed by the many vTuber talents of Hololive Production.

Note: This song was originally teased at Comiket 96, then later uploaded to YouTube on August 15, 2019 as a special music video related to Hololive Summer '19.

This music video is a newer full version of the song, produced to tease hololive's 1st Fes. concert 'Nonstop Story', which took place on January 24, 2020. It was then repurposed to advertise hololive's 2nd Fes. concert 'Beyond The Stage', and then again for their upcoming event, hololive IDOL PROJECT's 1st Live event, Bloom, which took place on February 17, 2021.
hashtag: #とまらないホロライブ #ホロライブSSS

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Advertisement
tags.description: Produced in order to promote the products of a certain company.

node.description:
__[Profile (onetrap)](https://onetrap.ageha.net/archives/onetrap_creator/kanamaru_yoshifumi)__

__Yoshifumi Kanamaru__ is a Japanese lyricist and composer affiliated with onetrap.

__[Profile (onetrap)](https://onetrap.ageha.net/archives/onetrap_creator/nakano_ryota) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryotanakano)__

__Ryouta Nakano__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger affiliated with onetrap.

__[Profile (onetrap)](https://onetrap.ageha.net/archives/onetrap_creator/nakano_ryota) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryotanakano)__

__Ryouta Nakano__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger affiliated with onetrap.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/synkdesign)__

__Fumiyoshi Kido__ is a Japanese producer.

**Height:** 154 cm
**Fanbase name:** Kapu-min
**Illustrator:** [Ayamy](https://anilist.co/staff/132820)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8HOxPs4Xvsm8H0ZxXGiBw) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yozoramel) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389856447/)

*"Sweet bites! It's Yozora Mel!"*

A vampire girl. Even though she is a vampire, she is not into blood. She loves acerola juice quite a lot.

Yozora Mel was a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. She is a member of Hololive's first generation.

On January 16, 2024, it was announced that Mel's contract has been terminated.

node.description:
**Height:** 162 cm
**Fanbase name:** Squad Rose
**Illustrator:** Azumiu Akitake

[Hololive Profile](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/aki-rosenthal/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFTLzh12_nrtzqBPsTCqenA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akirosenthal) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389857131)

Aki Rosenthal is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by hololive.

*"Alona, everyone! This is Aki Rosenthal a.k.a. AkiRose!"*

A girl who traveled from a different universe. She has hyper curiosity and manages to reach out to all sorts of things. Her trademark pigtails float due to some sort of supernatural power.

**Height:** 154 cm
**Fanbase name:** Haaton
**Illustrator:** [Haruyuki](https://anilist.co/staff/169835/Haruyuki)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/akai-haato/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1CfXB_kRs3C-zaeTG3oGyg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akaihaato) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/339567211/)

*"Welcome to your rouge awakening! This is Akai Haato!"*

A sassy kouhai. She is often prickly, however she manages to demand lots of attention from those with whom she has been getting along well. She loves red ribbons and heart shapes.

Akai Haato (a.k.a. Haachama) is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the first generation wave of Hololive and as well self-proclaimed to be from Hololive English generation zero.

**Height:** 154 cm
**Fanbase name:** Suba-tomo
**Illustrator:** [Ui Shigure](https://anilist.co/staff/141874/)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvzGlP9oQwU--Y0r9id_jnA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/oozorasubaru) | [Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/oozora-subaru/) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389859190/)

*"Sup? I'm Oozora Subaru!"*

The manager of an MMA club and an E-sports club. A supremely spirited, cheerful, lively girl who can talk to anyone without breaking a sweat. She’s currently practicing her pro-gamer skills.

Subaru Oozora is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. A part of the second generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 145 cm
**Fanbase name:** Shiokko
**Illustrator:** [Tam-U](https://anilist.co/staff/126171/TamU)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/murasaki-shion/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXTpFs_3PqI41qX2d9tL2Rw) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/murasakishionch) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389857640/)

"Hellshio! Murasaki Shion here!"

A random self-proclaimed child (though she is probably an adult) who appears around the Demonic-Realm Academy. She calls herself a highborne black magician (probably).
She can barely say her greeting, “Hellshio”.

Murasaki Shion was a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. A part of the second generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 160 cm
**Fanbase name:** Sora-tomo
**Illustrator:** [ordan](https://anilist.co/staff/175874/)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp6993wxpyDPHUpavwDFqgg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokino_sora) | [hololive Profile](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/tokino-sora/) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/286179206/#/)

*How's it going, Soratomos! It is Tokino Sora!*

Debuting on September 7, 2017, she is the first Virtual Idol of Hololive Production.
She loves singing and horror games, and her dream has been to “hold a live concert at Yokohama Arena” since the very beginning.
She had her major debut at Victor Entertainment in March 2019. On her road to pro idol, she played a role in the TV show “Watanuki-san Chi” while also running a podcast known as “SoraAoto!” She also takes an active role in other genres. On October 6, 2019, she held her own live concert “Dream!”

Tokino Sora is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber from Hololive Production. Apart of the zero generation wave of Hololive

**Height:** 155 cm
**Fanbase name:** Sukon-bu
**Illustrator:** [Mito Nagashiro](https://anilist.co/staff/134537/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/shirakami-fubuki/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdn5BQ06XqgXoAxIhbqw5Rg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shirakamifubuki) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/332704117/)

*"Foxy day to you! I'm Shirakami Fubuki!"*

A white haired kemomimi (animal-eared) highschool student. Although she is shy and mostly calm, she likes to talk to people. She would be very happy if you pay attention to her.

Shirakami Fubuki is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Part of the first generation wave of Hololive and is also a part of hololive GAMERS.

**Height:** 152 cm
**Fanbase name:** Matsurisu
**Illustrator:** [Haruki Minamura](https://anilist.co/staff/147123/)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ0UDLQCjY0rmuxCDE38FGg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/natsuiromatsuri) | [Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/natsuiro-matsuri/) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/336731767/)

*"Festival night! Natsuiro Matsuri is here!"*

A rookie on the Cheerleading Team. Cheerful and affectionate, her pleasant attitude means she gets along with everyone. She has a lot of friends, and loves festivals and events.

Matsuri Natsuiro is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the first generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 165 cm
**Fanbase name:** Choco Mate
**Illustrator:** [Masuishi Kinoto](https://twitter.com/shima_je)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/yuzuki-choco/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1suqwovbL1kzsoaZgFZLKg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuzukichococh) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389858754/)

*"Good evening, my cute students! It's your teacher, Choco!"8

A health doctor from the Demonic-Realm Academy. Has a high reputation around the school. It was told that the line of male students never ends. She loves snacks quite a lot, although one time her desk was caked with food wrappers, and she was then scolded badly.

Yuzuki Choco is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the second generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 148 cm
**Fanbase name:** Aqua Crew
**Illustrator:** [Gaou](https://anilist.co/staff/134099/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/minato-aqua/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1opHUrw8rvnsadT-iGp7Cg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minatoaqua) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/375504219) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@minatoaqua_hololive)

*"A-quality day to one and all! I'm Minato Aqua!"*

A marine maid-styled virtual maid. She is trying her very best, yet is still sometimes awkward and clumsy.

Minato Aqua was a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the second generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 152 cm
**Fanbase name:** Nakiri-gumi
**Illustrator:** [Kagura Nana](https://anilist.co/staff/143642/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/nakiri-ayame/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7fk0CB07ly8oSl0aqKkqFg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nakiriayame) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389858027/)

*"Greetings, humans! Nakiri Ayame has arrived!"*

A kimono-clad Oni girl from the Demonic-Realm Academy. As she loves to prank people, she always uses will-o’-the-wisp on them just to have fun. Many may not realize it, but she is actually the president of the student council.

**Height:** 152 cm
**Fanbase name:** 35P
**Illustrator:** [ordan](https://anilist.co/staff/175874/)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-hM6YJuNYVAmUWxeIr9FeA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuramiko35) | [Hololive Profile](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/sakuramiko/)  | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/366690056/)

*"Nya-hello! It's Sakura Miko!"*

She has been working on religious services really hard as a miko in the computer world. With the revelation of the gods, she is now visiting Japan. While performing her errand, she has now decided to become and work hard as a virtual miko idol.

Sakura Miko is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. A part of the zero generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 152 cm
**Fanbase name:** Onigiryaa
**Illustrator:** [Kamioka Chiroru](https://anilist.co/staff/152990/Chiroru-Kamioka)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/nekomata-okayu/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvaTdHTWBGv3MKj3KVqJVCw) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomataokayu) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/412135222/#/)

*Om, nom, nom! Okayu time!*

A cat raised by a old woman from the onigiri store. She streams just because there is a PC in the old woman’s room.

Nekomata Okayu is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the generation wave called hololive GAMERS.

**Height:** 165 cm
**Fanbase name:** Mio-fa
**Illustrator:** [Sai Izumi](https://anilist.co/staff/125532)

 [Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/ookami-mio/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp-5t9SrOQwXMU7iIjQfARg)  | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ookamimio) |  [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389862071/)

*"Hellooowl! It is Ookami Mio!"*

A black haired kemomimi girl who appeared on our radar randomly. She often shows up around shrines. She likes gaming.

**Height:** 156 cm
**Fanbase Name:** Koronesuki
**Illustrator:** [Fukahire](https://anilist.co/staff/120985/)

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/inugami-korone/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChAnqc_AY5_I3Px5dig3X1Q) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/inugamikorone) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/412135619/#/)

"G'morning! Fingers! Give me your fingers!!" The dog from a random bakery. She likes to play games when she has free time while watchdogging.

Inugami Korone is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Part of the generation wave called Hololive GAMERS.

**Height:** 154 cm
**Fanbase name:** Robosa
**Illustrator:** kuromaru9

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/roboco-san/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDqI2jOz0weumE8s7paEk6g/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/robocosan) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/robocosan.hololive.tv) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/20813493)

"Hello-robo! Roboco here!"

A lonely, wimpy robot from a random wasteland.
She is now hoping to contact and live with lots of people as a Virtual Liver.

Roboco is is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the zero generation wave of Hololive.

**Height:** 153 cm
**Fanbase name:** League of the Hare Alliance
**Illustrator:**  [Hagure Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/117227/Hagure-Yuuki)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1DCedRgGHBdm81E1llLhOQ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/usadapekora) | [Hololive Profile](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/usada-pekora/) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/443305053)

*"Konpeko~!"*

Usada Pekora is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the third generation wave of Hololive, also known as Hololive Fantasy.

__Debut Date:__ March 22, 2018 __Height:__ 160 cm __Fanbase Name:__ Stargazers __Illustrator:__ [Teshima Nari](https://anilist.co/staff/167589) __Generation:__ Solo ("0th gen") [Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/hoshimachi-suisei/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5CwaMl1eIgY8h02uZw7u8A) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/suisei_hosimati) A female Japanese virtual YouTuber endorsed by hololive. Currently part of the zero generation wave of hololive, Hoshimachi Suisei was originally an independent VTuber, focusing on making short comedy clips and song covers. She became a member of idol group S:gnal on July 1, 2018, and graduated from the group a month later and resumed activities as an independent. After performing her second original song [Tenkyuu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide](https://anilist.co/anime/119944) as a guest at AZKi’s first live, she announced that she would be joining Inonaka Music, a music label under hololive. On December 1, 2019, she was officially transferred from Inonaka Music to hololive’s main branch. On January 20, 2023, she became the first VTuber to be invited to THE FIRST TAKE. Her dream was to one day hold a live concert at Tokyo Budokan, which she achieved in 2025 for her third solo live concert “SuperNova”.

**Height:** 168 cm
**Fanbase name:** Pioneer
**3D Modeler:** kasokuSato

[Profile (hololive)](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/azki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AZKi_VDiVA) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0TXe_LYZ4scaW2XMyi5_kw) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/389056211)

A diva who became reborn into the virtual world in order to fabricate a new world. No matter the time, place, or position, she warps through all the barricades with her dazzling talent.

**Height:** 150 cm
**Fanbase name:** Houshou no Ichimi

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCzUftO8KOVkV4wQG1vkUvg) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/houshoumarine) | [Hololive Profile](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/houshou-marine/) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/454955503/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/43505343)

*"Ahoy~!"*

Houshou Marine is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. A part of the third generation wave of Hololive, also known as Hololive Fantasy. 

Her character designer is [Ai Akasa](https://anilist.co/staff/186919).

**Height:** 158 cm
**Fanbase name:** Order of Shirogane
**Illustrator:** [Watao](https://twitter.com/wait_ar/)

[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdyqAaZDKHXg4Ahi7VENThQ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/shiroganenoel) | [Hololive Profile](https://hololive.hololivepro.com/en/talents/shirogane-noel/) | [Bilibili](https://space.bilibili.com/454733056)

*"Hey muscle! Shirogane Noel's here!"*

While she is easy-going, she has a dangerous side where she attempts to solve all her problems with muscle power. As much as this fluffy, meatheaded knight hungers for power, she came to the world of VTubers where all the stronk people are, for training.

Shirogane Noel is a female Japanese Virtual YouTuber endorsed by Hololive Production. Apart of the third generation wave of Hololive, also known as Hololive Fantasy.
